measure.name: Residential Miscellaneous Electric Loads
measure.description: Adds miscellaneous electric equipment (TV, computers, etc.) to the building. Users either specify the annual energy consumption (in kWh/yr) or a multipler for the Building America Benchmark assumption (http://energy.gov/sites/prod/files/2014/03/f13/house_simulation_protocols_2014.pdf). The Building America MELs energy consumption is (in kWh/yr) 1108.1 + 180.2 * Num_br + 0.278 * Floor_area. Users must also specify the the space type where the MELs are applied to.
measure.modeler_description: Adds a new electric equipment object and the appropriate schedules.
